title: Authentication Context Certificate Extension
abstract:
This document defines an extension to X.509 certificates.  The extension
defined in this document holds data about how the certificate subject was
authenticated by the Certification Authority that issued the certificate in
which this extension appears.

This document also defines one data structure for inclusion in this
extension.  The data structure is designed to hold information when the subject
is authenticated using a Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) assertion.
